simplifiedChinese.title: Serving in Deed & Word
simplifiedChinese.Question1: With which character do you most identify in this story ? Why?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What strengths and/or weaknesses do you see in this character?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What do you think God was wanting your selected character to learn?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What do you think God is wanting you to learn through this story? How can you cooperate with his good purposes today?
